mapper.update: update ucourse set ucStatus=#{ucStatus} where uNo=#{uNo} and cNo=(select cNo from course where cName=#{cName})
mapper.select: select b.* from ucourse a,users b where a.uNo=b.uNo and cNo=#{cNo} and a.ucStatus>1 and a.uNo!=#{uNo}
select count(*) from ucourse where cNo=#{cNo} and ucStatus>1 and uNo!=#{uNo}
select * from course where cNo in (select distinct cNo from ucourse where uNo in (select a.uNo from ucourse a,users b where a.uNo=b.uNo and cNo=#{cNo} and a.ucStatus>1))
